author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: You needed to wait until the original package registration PR was merged. Otherwise you could have kept the version number the same and updated the original 0.1.0 package registration PR to a new commit (this one). There's no clock reset on the three day wait period.

body:
- Registering package: ReplicateBE
- Repository: https://github.com/PharmCat/ReplicateBE.jl
- Created by: @PharmCat
- Version: v0.1.1
- Commit: cae72138ddc098952047ee6d7e0dd044c274b977
- Reviewed by: @PharmCat
- Reference: https://github.com/PharmCat/ReplicateBE.jl/commit/cae72138ddc098952047ee6d7e0dd044c274b977#commitcomment-34796063
- Release notes:
<!-- BEGIN RELEASE NOTES -->
> - v0.1.1
>     * change keyword var -> dvar
>     * Step 0 variance calculaton
>     * Split REML β dependent and REML2 β independent
>     * Hessian matrix now come from ForwardDiff
>     *  g_tol, x_tol, f_tol keywords for Optim
>     * Optimization
>     * Show result
<!-- END RELEASE NOTES -->

<!--  -->
title: New package: ReplicateBE v0.1.1
